name: Tanuki No Tabi
summary: Taunki No Tabi (Tanuki's Journey) is a top-down, action-adventure shooter developed in Singapore polytechnic by pyu pyu production. There are three clans living in harmony, the Tanuki, the Saru and the Kitsune. Each individual species has an unique ability blessed upon a selected few by the Gods. The blessings obtained helps the races to prosper and live together peacefully. You get to play as Kotarou, a Tanuki that seeks to grow stronger and rescue his sister from the Kitsune who became greedy for power. Explore the world and earn gifts from the gods scattered across the land!
